Lyric:
[by:工作婊]
[00:10.75]Work, work, work, work, work, work
[00:12.74]You see me I be work, work, work, work, work, work
[00:15.28]You see me do me dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt
[00:17.86]For some of that work, work, work, work, work, work
[00:20.53]For you I got love, love, love, love, love, love
[00:23.17]When I came for my turn, turn, turn, turn, turn
[00:26.92]Join me I deserved it
[00:29.56]No time to have you lurking
[00:31.98]If I got right then you might like it
[00:34.49]You know I dealt with you the nicest
[00:37.20]Nobody touch me, I’m the righteous
[00:39.66]Nobody text me in a crisis
[00:41.49]I believed all of your dreams are fruition
[00:44.70]You took my heart and my keys and my vision
[00:46.71]You took my heart off my sleeve a decoration
[00:49.23]You mistaken my love I brought for you for foundation
[00:51.81]All that I wanted from you was to give me something that I never had
[00:57.83]Something that you've never seen
[01:00.32]Something that you've never been
[01:05.44]But I wake up and everything’s wrong

[01:18.74]Duh, duh, duh, duh, duh, duh
[01:20.50]For you I got nah, nah, nah, nah, nah, nah
[01:23.70]Before the tables turned, turned, turned, turned, turned, turned
[01:26.39]Baby something please
[01:28.97]Baby don’t you leave
[01:31.60]Don’t leave me stuck here in the streets (no, no)
[01:34.70]If I get another chance to
[01:36.54]I will never, no never neglect you
[01:39.16]I mean who am I to hold your past against you
[01:41.84]I just hope that it gets to you
[01:44.58]I hope that you see this through
[01:47.14]I hope that you see this true
[01:50.65]What can I say?
[01:52.36]Please recognize I’m trying baby
[01:54.94]I been work, work, work, work, work, work
[01:57.30]You see me I be work, work, work, work, work, work
[01:59.67]You see me do me dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt
[02:02.27]For some of that work, work, work, work, work, work
[02:04.88]For you I got love, love, love, love, love, love
[02:07.49]When I came for my turn, turn, turn, turn, turn, turn
[02:09.91]Yeah, okay
[02:10.78]You need to get done, done, done, done
[02:14.40]That’ll work, come over
[02:16.71]We just need to slow the motion
[02:19.15]Don't give that away to no one
[02:21.18]Long distance, I need you
[02:23.88]When I see potential I just gotta see it through
[02:26.46]If you had a twin I would still choose you
[02:29.10]I don't wanna rush into it, if it's too soon
[02:31.39]But I know you need to get done, done, done, done
[02:35.63]If you come over
[02:37.52]Sorry if I’m way less friendly
[02:40.10]I got niggas tryna end me
[02:42.28]Oh, yeah, I spilled all my emotions tonight, I’m sorry
[02:47.38]Rolling, rolling, rolling, rolling, rolling
[02:50.30]How many more shots until you’re rolling?
[02:53.22]We just need a face to face
[02:55.78]You could pick the time and the place
[02:58.46]You spent some time away
[03:01.30]Now you need to forward and give me all the
[03:03.00]Work, work, work, work, work, work
[03:04.89]You see me I be work, work, work, work, work, work
